Possibly related to bug 632749, though probably related to my weird monitor arrangement.

STR:

1) Move Firefox to top-most monitor.
2) Try to open View Source or Bookmark Manager

Expected:

The new window should open

Result:

An entry is added to the Window menu (eg. Source of: Aurora), but no new window appears.
